name: Survive
description:
SUMMARY

Survive is a 6-player multiplayer horror game. Survive a killer in different environments, complete the objectives and call the police to escape.

GAME

In "Survive" you will have to accomplish objectives to be able to restore power and call the police. Be careful because you will be chased by a killer chosen among the players and with strange abilities. All this in 6-player multiplayer!
With each new game, the objects necessary for the objectives will change places, which will involve being concentrated so as not to be caught by the killer.

CHARACTERISTICS

- 6 Players online
- proximity VOIP
- Replayability
- Many playable maps
- 3D Audio Experience
- Different class of characters inspired by horror movies

This game contains flashing lights which may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
